ARABIC: فَضْلًا مِّن رَّبِّكَ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: A favour from your Lord. That is the Great Victory.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: By the beneficence of your Lord. This will be the great success.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: as a favour from your Lord. That is the great triumph.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God will protect them from the torment of hell as a favor from your Lord. (Muhammad), this is certainly the greatest triumph.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: By the munificence of your Lord; this is the great success.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: As a bounty from your Lord! That will be the supreme success!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: A grace from your Lord; this is the great achievement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: a bounty from thy Lord; that is the mighty triumph.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: A bounty from thy Lord. That is the supreme triumph.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: as an act of grace. That will be the supreme triumph.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: A bounty from thy Lord. That! that is the supreme achievement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: —a grace from your Lord. That is the great success.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: As a Bounty from thy Lord! that will be the supreme achievement!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: As a Bounty from your Lord! That will be the supreme success!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: as a bounty from your Lord. That will be the mighty triumph.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: A favor from your Lord. That is the supreme salvation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: As bounty from your Lord. That is what is the great attainment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [44:57]   a bounty from your Lord (fadlan is a verbal noun, with the sense of tafaddulan, and is in the accusative [dependent status] because of an implied [preceding] tafaddala). That is the supreme triumph.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (A bounty from thy Lord) a favour from your Lord; and it is also said this means: a gift from your Lord. (That) gift (is the Supreme Triumph) the supreme safety: they earned the Garden and became safe from the 579 Fire.
